abstract: Sanofi-Aventis is weighing whether to make a sweetened takeover offer for Genzyme as soon as next week, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis is weighing whether to make a sweetened takeover offer for Genzyme as soon as next week, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis is weighing whether to make a sweetened takeover offer for Genzyme as soon as next week, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Sanofi Said to Consider Higher Genzyme Bid
